paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a homozygous TTR variant associated with senile systemic amyloidosis, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the present case, the homozygous mutation TTR (122 Val----Ile) is associated with SSA.

functional_data.summary: The variant leads to a predicted G-to-A transition, destroying an MaeIII restriction site.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation was confirmed to be homozygous in the patient.
variants.population_frequency: None of the 24 controls or 6 other SSA patients contained the variant.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on homozygosity and absence in controls.
variants.additional_notes: The mutation is consistent with autosomal recessive inheritance.
key_quotes: The patient's DNA was entirely resistant to MaeIII cleavage; therefore, only the mutant sequence was present.
Quantitative Southern blotting demonstrated that the patient's DNA contained two copies of the TTR gene per genome.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
